title: How to Make Chicken Parmesan
description:
Learn How to Make Chicken Parmesan with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Chicken-Parmesan

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: it's make chicken parmesan first pre-heat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit 205 degrees Celsius then in a large mixing bowl add 1 and 1/2 cups 75 grams of bread crumbs 1/4 cup 25 grams of grated Parmesan cheese and 1/2 teaspoon 1.5 grams of garlic powder whisk the ingredients together until they're thoroughly combined in a separate mixing bowl add 2 eggs and beat them with a whisk pour 1 cup 120 grams of all-purpose flour into a third mixing bowl then dredge one and a half pounds 680 grams of chicken breasts in the flour and shake the excess off dip each chicken breast into the eggs then immediately transfer them to the bread crumbs and cheese roll the chicken breasts in the bread crumbs to completely cover them to cook the chicken pour olive oil into a cast-iron skillet until there's a thin layer covering the bottom heat the skillet over medium-high heat for a few minutes add the chicken to the skillet and cook it for 5 to 7 minutes or until it's golden brown flip the chicken halfway through transfer the chicken to a plate and blot it with a paper towel to remove excess oil then pour 30 ounces 900 milliliters of marinara sauce into a baking dish and place the chicken breasts on top sprinkle one cup 100 grams of shredded mozzarella cheese over the chicken breasts and bake them for 10 to 12 minutes on the center rack of your oven remove your chicken from the oven garnish with parsley and you're doneit's make chicken parmesan first pre-heat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit 205 degrees Celsius then in a large mixing bowl add 1 and 1/2 cups 75 grams of bread crumbs 1/4 cup 25 grams of grated Parmesan cheese and 1/2 teaspoon 1.5 grams of garlic powder whisk the ingredients together until they're thoroughly combined in a separate mixing bowl add 2 eggs and beat them with a whisk pour 1 cup 120 grams of all-purpose flour into a third mixing bowl then dredge one and a half pounds 680 grams of chicken breasts in the flour and shake the excess off dip each chicken breast into the eggs then immediately transfer them to the bread crumbs and cheese roll the chicken breasts in the bread crumbs to completely cover them to cook the chicken pour olive oil into a cast-iron skillet until there's a thin layer covering the bottom heat the skillet over medium-high heat for a few minutes add the chicken to the skillet and cook it for 5 to 7 minutes or until it's golden brown flip the chicken halfway through transfer the chicken to a plate and blot it with a paper towel to remove excess oil then pour 30 ounces 900 milliliters of marinara sauce into a baking dish and place the chicken breasts on top sprinkle one cup 100 grams of shredded mozzarella cheese over the chicken breasts and bake them for 10 to 12 minutes on the center rack of your oven remove your chicken from the oven garnish with parsley and you're done

subtitles: to make chocolate with cocoa powder blend two cups of cocoa powder and 3 4 cup of softened butter until it becomes a paste fill a double boiler with one cup of water and place the chocolate on top of the boiler heating to a simmer over low heat gradually stir in half cup of sugar and 2 3 cup milk mixing until the chocolate is smooth and creamy pour the chocolate into a mold and let it cool before serving youto make chocolate with cocoa powder blend two cups of cocoa powder and 3 4 cup of softened butter until it becomes a paste fill a double boiler with one cup of water and place the chocolate on top of the boiler heating to a simmer over low heat gradually stir in half cup of sugar and 2 3 cup milk mixing until the chocolate is smooth and creamy pour the chocolate into a mold and let it cool before serving you

title: How to Make Pizza Dough
description:
Learn How to Make Pizza Dough with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Pizza-Dough

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make pizza dough first add two and a half cups 325 grams of flour and 1 teaspoon three grams of instant yeast to a bowl then add 2 teaspoons 8 grams of sugar 1/2 teaspoon 3 grams of salt 1 tablespoon 3 grams of dried oregano and 1/2 tablespoon 5 grams of garlic powder and whisk the dry ingredients together add in 2 tablespoons 15 milliliters of olive oil and then gradually pour in one cup 240 milliliters of warm water folding it into the dry mixture continue to mix everything until it sticks together and starts to form dough flour your work surface and knead the dough for 5 minutes shape the dough into a ball with your hands next coat the inside of a bowl with oil place the dough in it and cover the bowl with a cloth let the dough rise for 1 hour before using it in your recipeto make pizza dough first add two and a half cups 325 grams of flour and 1 teaspoon three grams of instant yeast to a bowl then add 2 teaspoons 8 grams of sugar 1/2 teaspoon 3 grams of salt 1 tablespoon 3 grams of dried oregano and 1/2 tablespoon 5 grams of garlic powder and whisk the dry ingredients together add in 2 tablespoons 15 milliliters of olive oil and then gradually pour in one cup 240 milliliters of warm water folding it into the dry mixture continue to mix everything until it sticks together and starts to form dough flour your work surface and knead the dough for 5 minutes shape the dough into a ball with your hands next coat the inside of a bowl with oil place the dough in it and cover the bowl with a cloth let the dough rise for 1 hour before using it in your recipe

title: How to Make Raspberry Puree
description:
Learn how to make raspberry puree with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Raspberry-Puree

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: to make raspberry puree first pour two cups 350 grams of fresh or frozen raspberries into a saucepan then add one and three-fourths cup 440 milliliters of water and a third cup 70 grams of sugar you can also add 1 tablespoon 15 milliliters of lemon juice if you want a tangier puree now heat the ingredients on the stovetop over medium heat and slowly stir them until the water comes to a boil reduce the heat and let the ingredients simmer for 20 to 30 minutes stirring the mixture occasionally next pour the mixture through a strainer to filter out the seeds use a spoon to push any big chunks of fruit through the holes finally transfer the puree to an airtight container and store it in the fridge so it cools and thickens you can keep your puree in the refrigerator for up to two weeksto make raspberry puree first pour two cups 350 grams of fresh or frozen raspberries into a saucepan then add one and three-fourths cup 440 milliliters of water and a third cup 70 grams of sugar you can also add 1 tablespoon 15 milliliters of lemon juice if you want a tangier puree now heat the ingredients on the stovetop over medium heat and slowly stir them until the water comes to a boil reduce the heat and let the ingredients simmer for 20 to 30 minutes stirring the mixture occasionally next pour the mixture through a strainer to filter out the seeds use a spoon to push any big chunks of fruit through the holes finally transfer the puree to an airtight container and store it in the fridge so it cools and thickens you can keep your puree in the refrigerator for up to two weeks to make raspberry puree first pour two cups 350 grams of fresh or frozen raspberries into a saucepan then add one and three-fourths cup 440 milliliters of water and a third cup 70 grams of sugar you can also add 1 tablespoon 15 milliliters of lemon juice if you want a tangier puree now heat the ingredients on the stovetop over medium heat and slowly stir them until the water comes to a boil reduce the heat and let the ingredients simmer for 20 to 30 minutes stirring the mixture occasionally next pour the mixture through a strainer to filter out the seeds use a spoon to push any big chunks of fruit through the holes finally transfer the puree to an airtight container and store it in the fridge so it cools and thickens you can keep your puree in the refrigerator for up to two weeks

subtitles: to make Vietnamese spring rolls first prepare the rice paper wrappers by laying them in warm water until they're soft lay the wrapper flat and place a bit of mint and some chopped shrimp and vegetables such as carrots cucumbers and lettuce on top lift the sides over the filling and carefully roll it up for Chinese spring rolls fry garlic ginger onions and green peppers on the stove add ketchup salt and set you on sauce for an extra burst of taste place them on a dampened rice wrapper and wrap carefully then fry them in oil in a deep pan for two minutesto make Vietnamese spring rolls first prepare the rice paper wrappers by laying them in warm water until they're soft lay the wrapper flat and place a bit of mint and some chopped shrimp and vegetables such as carrots cucumbers and lettuce on top lift the sides over the filling and carefully roll it up for Chinese spring rolls fry garlic ginger onions and green peppers on the stove add ketchup salt and set you on sauce for an extra burst of taste place them on a dampened rice wrapper and wrap carefully then fry them in oil in a deep pan for two minutes

subtitles: - minced ginger start by peeling off the skin with a spoon knife or peeler then slice the ginger into small discs next lay the blade of the knife flat over the ginger disc and firmly press down on it with your fist once all of the ginger discs are crushed turn the knife upright and rock it back and forth over the crushed ginger to mince it- minced ginger start by peeling off the skin with a spoon knife or peeler then slice the ginger into small discs next lay the blade of the knife flat over the ginger disc and firmly press down on it with your fist once all of the ginger discs are crushed turn the knife upright and rock it back and forth over the crushed ginger to mince it

subtitles: to saute green beans first cook them in a pot of boiling water for three minutes immediately transfer them to a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking process after they've cooled for a few minutes Pat the beans dry with paper towels next mince two cloves of garlic heat olive oil in a pan and cook the minced garlic for 30 seconds add the green beans and cook them for an additional 3 to 5 minutes to finish toss the beans in salt and serveto saute green beans first cook them in a pot of boiling water for three minutes immediately transfer them to a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking process after they've cooled for a few minutes Pat the beans dry with paper towels next mince two cloves of garlic heat olive oil in a pan and cook the minced garlic for 30 seconds add the green beans and cook them for an additional 3 to 5 minutes to finish toss the beans in salt and serve
